document.full_text: highly radioactive water has been found at a second reactor at a crippled nuclear power station in japan, the plant's operator said, as fears of contamination escalated two weeks after a huge earthquake and tsunami battered the complex.
document.title: high radiation levels at japanese plant raise new worry
lines_and_colors: highly radioactive water has been found at a second reactor at a crippled nuclear power station in japan, the plant's operator said, as fears of contamination escalated two weeks after a huge earthquake and tsunami battered the complex.
